verses.kjv: And thou, son of man, take thee a sharp knife, take thee a barber’s razor, and cause it to pass upon thine head and upon thy beard: then take thee balances to weigh, and divide the hair.
verses.web: “You, son of man, take a sharp sword. You shall take it as a barber’s razor to yourself, and shall cause it to pass over your head and over your beard. Then take balances to weigh and divide the hair.
verses.ct: "Now, son of man, take a sharp sword and use it like a barber's razor. Shave your head and your beard with it. Then get a set of scales, weigh the hair, and divide it into 3 equal portions.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt burn with fire a third part in the midst of the city, when the days of the siege are fulfilled: and thou shalt take a third part, and smite about it with a knife: and a third part thou shalt scatter in the wind; and I will draw out a sword after them.
verses.web: A third part you shall burn in the fire in the middle of the city, when the days of the siege are fulfilled. You shall take a third part, and strike with the sword around it. A third part you shall scatter to the wind, and I will draw out a sword after them.
verses.ct: When the days of your siege model are complete, burn 1/3 of the hair in a fire right in the middle of the city you drew. Take another 1/3 and chop at it with the sword all around the city. Scatter the last 1/3 into the wind, and I will chase after them with a drawn sword.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt also take thereof a few in number, and bind them in thy skirts.
verses.web: You shall take of it a few in number, and bind them in the folds of your robe.
verses.ct: But take a small number of hairs from that last portion and tuck them into the folds of your robe.

verses.kjv: Then take of them again, and cast them into the midst of the fire, and burn them in the fire; for thereof shall a fire come forth into all the house of Israel.
verses.web: Of these again you shall take, and cast them into the middle of the fire, and burn them in the fire. From it a fire will come out into all the house of Israel.
verses.ct: Then take some of those saved hairs, throw them into the fire, and let them burn. From this fire, destruction will spread to the entire house of Israel."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; This is Jerusalem: I have set it in the midst of the nations and countries that are round about her.
verses.web: “The Lord LORD says: ‘This is Jerusalem. I have set her in the middle of the nations, and countries are around her.
verses.ct: The Lord GOD says: "This represents Jerusalem. I placed her at the center of the nations, with countries all around her.

verses.kjv: And she hath changed my judgments into wickedness more than the nations, and my statutes more than the countries that are round about her: for they have refused my judgments and my statutes, they have not walked in them.
verses.web: She has rebelled against my ordinances in doing wickedness more than the nations, and against my statutes more than the countries that are around her; for they have rejected my ordinances, and as for my statutes, they have not walked in them.’
verses.ct: But she has rebelled against my laws more wickedly than any of the surrounding nations. She has rejected my commands and refused to live by my statutes — worse than the countries around her.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because ye multiplied more than the nations that are round about you, and have not walked in my statutes, neither have kept my judgments, neither have done according to the judgments of the nations that are round about you;
verses.web: “Therefore the Lord LORD says: ‘Because you are more turbulent than the nations that are around you, and have not walked in my statutes, neither have kept my ordinances, neither have followed the ordinances of the nations that are around you;
verses.ct: So the Lord GOD says: Because you have been more rebellious than the nations around you — refusing to follow my statutes, ignoring my commands, and not even living up to the standards of the nations surrounding you —

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I, even I, am against thee, and will execute judgments in the midst of thee in the sight of the nations.
verses.web: therefore the Lord LORD says: ‘Behold, I, even I, am against you; and I will execute judgments among you in the sight of the nations.
verses.ct: the Lord GOD declares: I myself am against you. I will carry out judgment on you right there where the nations can see it.

verses.kjv: And I will do in thee that which I have not done, and whereunto I will not do any more the like, because of all thine abominations.
verses.web: I will do in you that which I have not done, and which I will not do anything like it any more, because of all your abominations.
verses.ct: Because of all your disgusting practices, I will do something to you that I have never done before and will never do again.

verses.kjv: Therefore the fathers shall eat the sons in the midst of thee, and the sons shall eat their fathers; and I will execute judgments in thee, and the whole remnant of thee will I scatter into all the winds.
verses.web: Therefore the fathers will eat the sons within you, and the sons will eat their fathers. I will execute judgments on you; and I will scatter the whole remnant of you to all the winds.
verses.ct: Parents will eat their own children within your walls, and children will eat their parents. I will execute judgment on you and scatter everyone who survives to the four winds.

verses.kjv: Wherefore, as I live, saith the Lord GOD; Surely, because thou hast defiled my sanctuary with all thy detestable things, and with all thine abominations, therefore will I also diminish thee; neither shall mine eye spare, neither will I have any pity.
verses.web: Therefore as I live,’ says the Lord LORD, ‘surely, because you have defiled my sanctuary with all your detestable things, and with all your abominations, therefore I will also diminish you. My eye won’t spare, and I will have no pity.
verses.ct: As surely as I live, declares the Lord GOD, because you defiled my sanctuary with all your vile and detestable practices, I will cut you down without mercy. I will not look on you with pity, and I will show no compassion.

verses.kjv: A third part of thee shall die with the pestilence, and with famine shall they be consumed in the midst of thee: and a third part shall fall by the sword round about thee; and I will scatter a third part into all the winds, and I will draw out a sword after them.
verses.web: A third part of you will die with the pestilence, and they will be consumed with famine within you. A third part will fall by the sword around you. A third part I will scatter to all the winds, and will draw out a sword after them.
verses.ct: A 3rd of your people will die from plague and be consumed by famine inside your walls. Another 3rd will fall by the sword around your city. The final 3rd I will scatter to the winds, and I will pursue them with a drawn sword.

verses.kjv: Thus shall mine anger be accomplished, and I will cause my fury to rest upon them, and I will be comforted: and they shall know that I the LORD have spoken it in my zeal, when I have accomplished my fury in them.
verses.web: “ ‘Thus my anger will be accomplished, and I will cause my wrath toward them to rest, and I will be comforted. They will know that I, LORD, have spoken in my zeal, when I have accomplished my wrath on them.
verses.ct: Then my anger will be spent. I will pour out my fury on them until it is satisfied, and I will be vindicated. When I have finished unleashing my wrath, they will know that I, the LORD, spoke with fierce passion.

verses.kjv: Moreover I will make thee waste, and a reproach among the nations that are round about thee, in the sight of all that pass by.
verses.web: “ ‘Moreover I will make you a desolation and a reproach among the nations that are around you, in the sight of all that pass by.
verses.ct: I will turn you into a wasteland and an object of scorn among the surrounding nations, visible to everyone who passes by.

verses.kjv: So it shall be a reproach and a taunt, an instruction and an astonishment unto the nations that are round about thee, when I shall execute judgments in thee in anger and in fury and in furious rebukes. I the LORD have spoken it.
verses.web: So it will be a reproach and a taunt, an instruction and an astonishment, to the nations that are around you, when I execute judgments on you in anger and in wrath, and in wrathful rebukes—I, LORD, have spoken it—
verses.ct: You will become a disgrace, a mockery, a warning, and a horror to the nations around you — when I execute judgment on you in anger, fury, and fierce punishment. I, the LORD, have spoken.

verses.kjv: When I shall send upon them the evil arrows of famine, which shall be for their destruction, and which I will send to destroy you: and I will increase the famine upon you, and will break your staff of bread:
verses.web: when I send on them the evil arrows of famine that are for destruction, which I will send to destroy you. I will increase the famine on you, and will break your staff of bread.
verses.ct: I will unleash the deadly arrows of famine against you — arrows meant to destroy. I will pile famine upon famine and cut off your food supply completely.

verses.kjv: So will I send upon you famine and evil beasts, and they shall bereave thee; and pestilence and blood shall pass through thee; and I will bring the sword upon thee. I the LORD have spoken it.
verses.web: I will send on you famine and evil animals, and they will bereave you. Pestilence and blood will pass through you. I will bring the sword on you. I, LORD, have spoken it.’ ”
verses.ct: I will send famine and savage wild animals against you, and they will rob you of your children. Plague and bloodshed will sweep through you, and I will bring the sword down on you. I, the LORD, have spoken."
